name: REXVINI
tag_list: wine-database, user-generated-content, wine, rating, sharing, social, tasting
overview:
REXVINI is an online wine database:

  • Wine drinkers are able to search, rate and comment on wines

  • Wine drinkers can interact in different ways with wine producers

  • Wine drinkers can add wines to the database on their own

  • Wine drinkers can create lists to collect wines and share them with friends

  • By using social plugins, wine drinkers can share information about wines, producers and wine lists on their social networks

  • Wine producers can create a producer profil to present themselves to wine drinkers and interact with them

  • Wine producers can provide the information on where to buy their products

To this point of time, REXVINI is a German language-based service.
